mapper.select: SELECT A.REP_ROUT_ID, A.DAY_DIV, A.ALLOC_NO FROM BRT_OPER_ALLOC_PL_ROUT_INFO A WHERE A.REP_ROUT_ID = #{REP_ROUT_ID} AND A.DAY_DIV = #{DAY_DIV} GROUP BY A.ALLOC_NO ORDER BY A.ALLOC_NO
SELECT A.VHC_ID ,A.VHC_NO ,B.COMP_NM FROM BMS_VHC_MST A INNER JOIN BRT_REP_ROUT_VHC_CMPSTN C ON A.VHC_ID = C.VHC_ID LEFT JOIN BMS_TRANSCOMP_MST B ON A.COMP_ID = B.COMP_ID
SELECT A.DRV_ID ,A.DRV_NM FROM BMS_DRV_MST A INNER JOIN BRT_REP_ROUT_DRV_CMPSTN B ON A.DRV_ID = B.DRV_ID
